Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm on the air five hours, and I blurt out anything in my head. Dangerous? Maybe

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm probably a little too desperate to be successful

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, first of all, I'm worth every penny

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't talk about my salary

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the voice of honesty

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel blessed, I really feel fulfilled

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: I've come to appreciate other people's talents

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: Late night television is ready for someone like me... standards have gone to an all-time low

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: My point of reference is life, in everything that I do

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: The success of any stand-up act comes out of life experience

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am beloved by millions

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: People who annoy people are the luckiest people in the world

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from Canada, so Thanksgiving to me is just Thursday with more food. And I'm thankful for that

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the solution to making this world better is if we would just be healthy, mentally

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: I think being a dad is scary. I mean, I'm not that grown-up myself

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: My childlike qualities sometimes lead me to jump into projects without thinking of the consequences

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no skill. You can be a rock and move into another cash bracket

Quote.Author: Howie Mandel
Quote.QuoteValue: We were a very small circle of writers. Everybody brought to the table their own life experience

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like false happy endings, and I don't think the real world is such a forgiving place

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: My musical education was grounded in blues and Chicago blues - John Lee Hooker and Otis Redding

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: Being in a studio is quite a creative and energetic process

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: When I first started to sing, I just swung at it with an axe

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: The best vocalists I can think of are female

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought of myself as a very, very obscure artist

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Muddy Waters and Nina Simone. I also watched 'The Blues Brothers' movie over and over

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: I never wrote music for the mainstream

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: Blues is a very physical music

Quote.Author: Hozier
Quote.QuoteValue: I just hate getting my hair cut

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every successful man is a proud wife and a surprised mother-in-law

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Never give in and never give up

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every successful man stands a surprised mother-in-law

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: To be realistic today is to be visionary. To be realistic is to be starry-eyed

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not what they take away from you that counts. It's what you do with what you have left

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately, our affluent society has also been an effluent society

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is hammered out on the anvil of discussion, dissent, and debate

Quote.Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote.QuoteValue: To err is human. To blame someone else is politics

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I know my choices will be creative so long as I follow my heart

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am deluded enough to think I can bring something to the table

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in a vintage pub rock band called Clover in the 1970s

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: It's true, I do like cheering people up

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a Bay Area guy, no question

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Film is a lark to me - thank God I don't have to make a living from it

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't tap dance, and I don't think you can learn to tap dance in three weeks at my ripe old age

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I was knocked out by the show, Chicago

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Our first record, 'Huey Lewis And The News', was seen by no one - it sold 25 copies

Quote.Author: Huey Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Today, it's very tempting to create songs by cutting and pasting in the studio

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: My fear was not of death itself, but a death without meaning

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes if you want to get rid of the gun, you have to pick the gun up

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: We have two evils to fight, capitalism and racism. We must destroy both racism and capitalism

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: Any unarmed people are slaves, or are subject to slavery at any given moment

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the people behind me and the people are my strength

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: The revolution has always been in the hands of the young. The young always inherit the revolution

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: Black Power is giving power to people who have not had power to determine their destiny

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: I think what motivates people is not great hate, but great love for other people

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: The walls, the bars, the guns and the guards can never encircle or hold down the idea of the people

Quote.Author: Huey Newton
Quote.QuoteValue: The first lesson a revolutionary must learn is that he is a doomed man

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: A free press is the cornerstone of democracy; there is no question about that

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: The moral of filmmaking in Britain is that you will be screwed by the weather

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: You know everyone loves to be the villain

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that's the whole point of Bridget Jones. It's all about that it's okay to fail

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have any particular burning desire to go back to being cuddly. Not really

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Basically, my life is so boring, it's embarrassing

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm horrible in the mornings. I'm grumpy

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's something unromantic about marriage. You're closing yourself off

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is probably a way of dealing with anxiety. Sometimes it's a way of dealing with pain

Quote.Author: Hugh Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a hopeless romantic. I'm quite the reverse. I'm a nasty piece of work, an ego maniac

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: It's good to be selfish. But not so self-centered that you never listen to other people

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I'm the most successful man I know. I wouldn't trade places with anybody in the world

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short to be living somebody else's dream

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: Surrounding myself with beautiful women keeps me young

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: Picasso had his pink period and his blue period. I am in my blonde period right now

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: The major civilizing force in the world is not religion, it is sex

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: I have about 100 pairs of pajamas. I like to see people dressed comfortably

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents are wonderful people and they instilled in me an idealism for which I'm grateful

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, from my point of view, I'm the luckiest cat on the planet

Quote.Author: Hugh Hefner
Quote.QuoteValue: I am in very good health. I've never felt better

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, the smell of fresh-made coffee is one of the greatest inventions

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: To get down to the quick of it, respect motivates me - not success

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: Your wife is always right. Very simple. I think I'm going to get it tattooed on my forehead

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: Salvatore Ferragamo have done some nice handmade suits for me

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm a lush at anything, it's food and drink. I'm not materialistic in any way, but I value food

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd sell my soul for a good cause

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who thinks they're indispensible is fooling themselves

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to have a robot at home

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the Rolling Stones for karaoke. 'Sympathy For The Devil' is a great one

Quote.Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm quite a competitive person, so I do quite like to win

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a coffee fanatic. Once you go to proper coffee, you can't go back. You cannot go back

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there is a basic comfort in clever people who know things

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: I never was someone who was at ease with happiness

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: To be able to pretend to be something that I'm frankly not is very liberating and exciting

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: Screenwriting is the most prized of all the cinematic arts. Actually, it isn't, but it should be

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate menus, I hate choosing food. I just want to be brought. Bring me dinner!

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe it or not, perhaps I don't show it much, or well, but I think I like people

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: You hope that your teenage self would like and forgive your 50-year-old self

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: I do actually like Los Angeles. Partly because I was told I wouldn't

Quote.Author: Hugh Laurie
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is an event. It happens to you, and you deal with it in whatever way you can

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: Mutual respect! That's what it takes to be friends

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no turning back

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: We must confront the privileged elite who have destroyed a large part of the world

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: They do not walk in... the path of Christ

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: This has been a great victory for the Venezuelan people

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: Venezuela has changed forever

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a President held prisoner, that I haven't resigned and I will not resign

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: I remember. How many minutes do I have left President? About one, one minute

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not perfect, but we do have democracy

Quote.Author: Hugo Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: I hereby accuse the North American empire of being the biggest menace to our planet

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole world is about three drinks behind

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: Things are never so bad they can't be made worse

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: I should never have switched from Scotch to Martinis

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: The only point in making money is, you can tell some big shot where to go

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem with the world is that everyone is a few drinks behind

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born when you kissed me. I died when you left me. I lived a few weeks while you loved me

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing you owe the public is a good performance

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not a star until they can spell your name in Karachi

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: All you owe the public is a good performance

Quote.Author: Humphrey Bogart
Quote.QuoteValue: Well everybody in Casablanca has problems. Yours may work out

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I am blessed beyond belief

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a nerd. Total geek. I never went to homecoming or prom or anything

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love music gear, I'm a total geek all around

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a fun-loving environment - you work hard and play hard

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could make noise with anything, I was going to

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: All the people I hung out with were musicians

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Thank you to country radio for believing in me

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was in high school, I had binders with pictures of tour buses

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in my dream world

Quote.Author: Hunter Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I want people to say about me, 'I know he's making music because he loves it.'

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Swallow your pride and admit that we all need help at times

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Rationalism and Newtonian science has lured us into dark woods, but a new metaphysics can rescue us

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The most powerful moral influence is example

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to live man must believe in that for which he lives

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The faith I was born into formed me

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Religion is the call to confront reality; to master the self

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: God is defined by Jesus but not confined to Jesus

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The Buddha is in me, the Buddha is in you. Live up to it

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: In nature, the emphasis is in what is rather than what ought to be

Quote.Author: Huston Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up taking it for granted that missionaries were what American boys grew up to be

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not underestimate the determination of a quiet man

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many couples break up without understanding the consequences for their families

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Aspiration, it seems, is in danger of becoming the preserve of the wealthy

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The public thinks that homelessness is about not having any accommodation to go to

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: A good proportion of foreign nationals in jobs in the UK are in semi or low-skilled occupations

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not celebrate people who have made success out of serious hard work

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: After years of piecemeal reform the current welfare system is complex and unfair

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Over the years the political establishment has frowned if a mainstream politician mentions marriage

Quote.Author: Iain Duncan Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The financial costs of family breakdown are incredibly high

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: My first priority is to my wife, as hers is to me, and to our child

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: A bicycle has transformed my experience of London

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: You really are being quite foolish to smoke

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not sure I'm the sort of actor people are hugely interested in finding out an awful lot about

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: You're spoilt as an actor if you are in that small percentage that works regularly

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happiest when I can just be a director and watch

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been aware of the work I do as an actor being directorial in feel

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm too much of a big kid

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know anyone who's suffered lung cancer

Quote.Author: Iain Glen
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't crave Hollywood

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Older women are best, because they always think they may be doing it for the last time

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Never say 'no' to adventures. Always say 'yes', otherwise you'll lead a very dull life

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Most marriages don't add two people together. They subtract one from the other

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Once is happenstance. Twice is coincidence. Three times is enemy action

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: I shall not waste my days in trying to prolong them

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: Men want a woman whom they can turn on and off like a light switch

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: You only live twice. Once when you are born and once when you look death in the face

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: A horse is dangerous at both ends and uncomfortable in the middle

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman should be an illusion

Quote.Author: Ian Fleming
Quote.QuoteValue: If I wait for the genius to come, it just doesn't arrive

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything in Russia is made of cement - phone booths, fence posts and light bulbs

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: Russians don't complain, usually

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: When I needed to think or was really upset, generally I climbed a tree

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are charms. It's like a song you didn't even know you knew

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: I only saw one English-speaking person all the way across Siberia

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: Siberia is a state of mind

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: Russian humor is to adapt or make some sense or nonsense out of the insanity of their lives

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: People in Russia adapt to misery by a deep, deep humor

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: I would hate to see the idea of freedom disappear, and I wonder if maybe it will

Quote.Author: Ian Frazier
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a disregard for my reader in humor pieces

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: In every generation, there are quite firm rules on how to behave when you are crazy

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: Great books are rare

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: Each of us becomes a new person as we re-describe the past

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: Molecular biology has routinely taken problematic things under its wing without altering core ideas

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a dilettante. My governing word is 'curiosity.'

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: One of Kuhn's marvellous legacies is science studies as we know it today

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the things Kuhn said about normal science is that people 'expect' things to be discovered

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not need to have a way to talk clearly about other people's images

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: Brain science will be the most popular science of the early twenty-first century

Quote.Author: Ian Hacking
Quote.QuoteValue: Among the lesser effects of quantum theory are gaping holes in old ideas about causality

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: We tend to think about fascism in terms of the Second World War

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone should be good at what they do

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate auditions - when I'm doing them, I can't wait to get out the bleeding door

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to be rich and famous

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I was relatively technically adept. I can edit and wire up a light

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm belligerent rather than ambitious

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not usually attracted to big-budget American films

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I've only used my own voice about four times on film

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: Not being able to work would make me very unhappy

Quote.Author: Ian Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: That's what I like about Neil Jordan's films: everyone is better at what they do than you are

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: I was an intimate sort of child who never spoke up in groups. I preferred close friends

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: You can spin stories out of the ways people understand and misunderstand each other

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: One has to have the courage of one's pessimism

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't hold grudges

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: Now, I'm an atheist. I really don't believe for a moment that our moral sense comes from a god

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: True intelligence requires fabulous imagination

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've yet to meet somebody who said, 'Your stories are so revolting I couldn't read them.'

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: Not being boring is quite a challenge

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: What reader wants to be told what attitude to strike?

Quote.Author: Ian Mcewan
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading reviews makes you thin-skinned. It's like waves washing layers off your skin

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Macbeth' was a very lucky play for me

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the Broadway audiences, who relish live drama and don't hesitate to display their enthusiasm

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: Every anti-gay remark from the Church gives the thug a license to be cruel

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not quite as cool as I would like to be, really

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing Middle-earth is short on is the feminine

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: Gandalf is in Middle-earth to keep an eye on everybody, and that can be a rather serious matter

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the sort of person who doesn't write in ink. I only write in pencil, so it can be rubbed out

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned that coming out was crucial to self-esteem

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: You mustn't upstage the bride

Quote.Author: Ian Mckellen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've often thought the Bible should have a disclaimer in the front saying, 'This is fiction.'

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't particularly want to stay close to your ex-wife. Or why would she be your ex-wife?

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: What you do is, you just do the gig, enjoy, get on with it, and treat the rest as horse doodle

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: The bad boy: always more fun

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: Bosses will tell you they are looking for something different but they're not, actually

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, I'm an actor. I do what comes along

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: Every actor has to love and loathe the character he plays

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in the death penalty, but I understand personal vengeance

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: My daughter said, 'I don't think granddad really suits you.'

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is great therapy - you get to do things you'd normally get arrested for

Quote.Author: Ian McShane
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only two kinds of actors - good ones and bad ones... and lucky ones and unlucky ones

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to have a dream... if you don't have any big dreams, nothing happens

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: Moving from Wales to Italy is like moving to a different country

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't settle in Italy - it was like living in a foreign country

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: I love horse racing, I play golf, and I love travelling

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: You can enjoy yourself, but you need to look after yourself as well

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got tremendous respect for different cultures, for the food and everything

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the Stereophonics. I know the lead singer, Kelly Jones, and there's the Welsh connection

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I can cook is Welsh rarebit

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: I was so shy when I was younger. When I first went to Liverpool I didn't say a word for a year

Quote.Author: Ian Rush
Quote.QuoteValue: It's different from Liverpool. Boston seems to be a friendly place

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a million acquaintances but just two or three true friends. I can't hide anything from them

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: No one knows what women want!

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: I kind of think too much, I try do too many things at once

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't get anywhere without the people who have come into your life

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: I never wanted to be one of those actors with a political agenda

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: There are always decades that interest people. For me, that's the Roaring Twenties

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't ever want anything to come in the way of me truthfully telling a story

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: Every love story needs a catalyst of some sort

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: The most underused, under-appreciated group of people in the world is our youth

Quote.Author: Ian Somerhalder
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to make it clear that I have been working since I was ten years old

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to see more women working as directors and producers

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: Often I pretended to a cameraman to know less than I did. That way I got more cooperation
